mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user_character_map ( user_id, character_id, regist_ymdt, modify_ymdt ) SELECT usr.user_id, chr.character_id, NOW(), NOW() FROM tb_user usr, tb_character chr WHERE usr.user_id = #{userId} AND chr.character_id = #{characterId}
mapper.select: SELECT map.user_id AS userId, chr.character_id AS characterId, chr.story AS story, chr.image_url AS imageUrl, chr.tier AS tier FROM tb_user_character_map map, tb_character chr WHERE map.user_id = #{userId} AND chr.character_id = map.character_id
SELECT sk.skill_id AS skillId, FROM tb_user_character_skill_map map, tb_skill sk WHERE map.user_id = #{userId} AND map.character_id = #{characterId} AND sk.skill_id = map.skill_id
mapper.insert: INSERT tb_user_character_skill_map ( user_id, character_id, skill_id, regist_ymdt, modify_ymdt ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{characterId}, #{skillId}, NOW(), NOW() )
